message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $13250?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $13000?
